name: Biomni: Detect and Characterize Structural Variations
description: Detects and characterizes structural variations (SVs) in genomic sequencing data. Uses LUMPY for SV detection followed by annotation with COSMIC and/or ClinVar databases to identify deletions, inversions, translocations, and duplications.

bam_file_path.description: Path to the aligned sequencing data in BAM format

reference_genome_path.description: Path to the reference genome in FASTA format

output_dir.description: Directory where results will be saved

cosmic_db_path.description: Path to the COSMIC database for cancer annotation (optional)

clinvar_db_path.description: Path to the ClinVar database for clinical annotation (optional)

output.description: Research log summarizing the steps performed and results obtained

author: Biomni
